alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 22 at 1:56PM EDT until September 23 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TO 8 PM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Up to 1 1/2 ft of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield County. In New York, Southern Westchester County. * WHEN...From 4 PM to 8 PM EDT Saturday. * COASTAL FLOOD IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected in vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. As much as 1 1/2 ft of inundation above ground level, which will cause shallow flooding on some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns and homes/businesses with basements near the waterfront. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional rounds of localized minor coastal flooding are possible Sunday into early next week, particularly during the afternoon high tide.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
